amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to disapprove the Presidential certification of Mexico; provide for a waiver of the requirement to withhold assistance for Mexico; and require the President to consult with Congress on the status of counter-narcotics cooperation between the U.S. and other countries. See Hastert amendment (A002) for further description.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on International relations now printed in the joint resolution.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on International Relations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the International Relations amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 195 (Roll no. 47).
